article_text: A cloud of marijuana smoke fills the sky above Lazarat, Albania. The smoke was a result of police burning plants during a crackdown that included 10 tons of marijuana.

article_summary:
A cloud of marijuana smoke fills the sky above Lazarat, Albania.
The smoke was a result of police burning plants during a crackdown that included 10 tons of marijuana.
